response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to both of us. This product, which I believe you would appreciate deeply, is worth $1,000,000 to you and represents a significant investment in your future endeavors. I am offering it to you today at a special price of $900,000, reflecting my desire to see this valuable asset in capable hands. Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further or if you have any questions about the product. I am here to provide all the information you need to make an informed decision.", "product_price": 900000}
